    • Uses of InvokeItf in leitej.thread

      Methods in leitej.thread with parameters of type InvokeItf 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AgnosticThread.workOn​(InvokeItf invoke)
      Use this method to put this thread working on parameter.
      Constructors in leitej.thread with parameters of type InvokeItf 
      Constructor Description
      AgnosticThread​(InvokeItf invoke)
      Creates a new instance of AgnosticThread, with a thread name (null) and to run invoke only once.
      This is like a fire and forget, don't need to check the return of invocation or is void.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean ShutdownHookUtil.add​(InvokeItf invoke)
      Appends the specified element to the list that will run this tasks in parallel mode.
      static boolean ShutdownHookUtil.addToFirst​(InvokeItf invoke)
      Appends the specified element to the list to be called sequentially before generic tasks added by 'add' method.

      Appends the specified element to the list to be called sequentially after generic tasks added by 'add' method.

      Block execution of System.exit only for the Thread that calls this method.

      Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list, if it is present.
